name: F1 The Movie (2025)
summary: Loved the direction of the movie - showcasing more so about team work over individual heroics. Watch it on an IMAX screen asap!
pros: Made me FEEEL like I was racing. Lovely to witness on an IMAX screen.
Was expecting more of heroics, but the focus on team work was fresh and interesting to me
cons: Long movie, yet I felt they could've made it longer
